languages.text: "Следите лучше за своим псом, а не за людьми на мостике. Их столько, сколько нужно Лорд-капитану — и ни человеком больше".
"You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."
languages.original_text: "Следите лучше за своим псом, а не за людьми на мостике. Их столько, сколько нужно Лорд-капитану — и ни человеком больше".

traits.locale_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."
"You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

"You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."
"You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

languages.text: 「ブリッジの人員を監視するより、まずは自分の犬にもっと目を光らせたほうがいいですよ。ブリッジにいるのは、ロード・キャプテンが必要とする数だけ、それ以上でも以下でもありません」
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: 「ブリッジの人員を監視するより、まずは自分の犬にもっと目を光らせたほうがいいですよ。ブリッジにいるのは、ロード・キャプテンが必要とする数だけ、それ以上でも以下でもありません」

languages.text: "Behaltet lieber Euren Hund im Auge anstatt die Anzahl der Besucher auf der Brücke. Es sind exakt so viele, wie der Lord Captain braucht, nicht mehr und nicht weniger."
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: "Behaltet lieber Euren Hund im Auge anstatt die Anzahl der Besucher auf der Brücke. Es sind exakt so viele, wie der Lord Captain braucht, nicht mehr und nicht weniger."

languages.text: « Vous feriez mieux de surveiller votre chien au lieu de vous préoccuper du nombre de personnes sur la passerelle. Il y en a autant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en a besoin. »
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: « Vous feriez mieux de surveiller votre chien au lieu de vous préoccuper du nombre de personnes sur la passerelle. Il y en a autant que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en a besoin. »

languages.text: «Más le valdría vigilar de cerca a su perro en vez de contar las personas que hay en el puente. Hay tantas como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán cree necesarias, ni una más».
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: «Más le valdría vigilar de cerca a su perro en vez de contar las personas que hay en el puente. Hay tantas como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán cree necesarias, ni una más».

languages.text: “你最好把注意力放在你自己的狗身上，别总盯着舰桥上的人。舰长大人希望舰桥上有多少人，那舰桥上就有多少人，一个也不能多，一个也不能少。”
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: “你最好把注意力放在你自己的狗身上，别总盯着舰桥上的人。舰长大人希望舰桥上有多少人，那舰桥上就有多少人，一个也不能多，一个也不能少。”

languages.text: "Köprüye giren çıkana değil de köpeğine göz kulak ol. Lord Kaptan'a kaç kişi lazımsa o kadar var işte, ne eksik ne de fazla."
languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."

traits.locale_text: "Köprüye giren çıkana değil de köpeğine göz kulak ol. Lord Kaptan'a kaç kişi lazımsa o kadar var işte, ne eksik ne de fazla."

languages.original_text: "You would be better served keeping a closer watch on your dog rather than the people on the bridge. There are as many of them as the Lord Captain requires, not one more."
